name: Narrak

trait.name: Insanity
text: Narrak has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: Narrak has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
text: While in sunlight, Narrak has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: Narrak is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (Save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks) Narrak has two 2nd-level spell slots, which he regains after finishing a short or long rest, and knows the following warlock spells:
Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast, friends, poison spray
â€¢ 2nd level (2 slots): armor of Agathys, charm person, hex, hold person, ray of enfeeblement, spider climb

action.name: Armor of Shadows (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
text: Narrak casts mage armor on himself

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: One with Shadows
text: While he is in a dim light or darkness, Narrak can become invisible. He remains so until he moves or takes an action or reaction.

spells: eldritch blast, friends, poison spray, armor of Agathys, charm person, hex, hold person, ray of enfeeblement, spider climb
